lines: 1. Waluwo yorno mar msalaba,kwadhiyo e polo;Ok nwaluor maricho mogundho,ka Wuonwa ritowa.
Dala wa man malo e polo,(Dalawa dalawa dala man malo e polo);Waluwo yorno mar msalabanyaka piny mar hera.
2. Waluwo yorno mar msalaba;Yesu osetelo;Wanawuothi e ndach jatendwa,nyaka dhowath mar kuwe.
3. Waluwo yorno mar msalaba,kata yo rach nade;Luet Jawarwa notelnwa mabernyaka wachop ire.
